Title: Sustainability, customer proximity and talent investment will remain central to our strategy, says Greaves Cotton Vice Chairman
Summary: Greaves Cotton transformed from a single-business, single-fuel company to a diversified, fuel-agnostic leader through strategic evolution, digital initiatives, and expansion into multiple sectors, focusing on sustainable innovation and customer-centric solutions.

Title: Greaves Electric Mobility IPO: Rs 1000 cr! Vijay Kedia-backed company's EV arm to list soon
Summary: Greaves Electric Mobility Limited (GEML), a subsidiary of Greaves Cotton, filed for a Rs 1,000 crore IPO with SEBI, featuring a fresh issue and an offer-for-sale by its parent company and a major investor.

Title: Greaves Electric Mobility IPO: Rs 1000 cr! Vijay Kedia-backed company's EV arm to list soon
Summary: Greaves Electric Mobility Limited, a subsidiary of Greaves Cotton, filed for a Rs 1,000 crore IPO, including a fresh issue and offer-for-sale, while Greaves Cotton's stock hit an all-time high following the announcement.

Title: These 5 smallcap stocks hit 52-week highs, rallied up to 55% in a month
Summary: Five smallcap stocks - Greaves Cotton, Man InfraConstruction, Caplin Point Laboratories, Welspun Enterprises, and Orchid Pharma - hit 52-week highs as Sensex gained 227 points, with Greaves Cotton showing the highest monthly gain of 57%.

Title: Greaves Cotton Stock Soars 16% as Greaves Electric Mobility Prepares for IPO
Summary: Greaves Cotton's stock surged 16% on heavy trading volumes, driven by its subsidiary GEML's upcoming IPO, reflecting the company's successful diversification and focus on sustainable mobility solutions.
